name: Game Idea Generator (Ali107)
description:
Have you ever wanted to make a game but have no idea what game to make? Well, this kind of solve your problem. You can generate as many random unique game ideas as possible.

It selects keywords from an 6 different arrays, and assembles them into a sentence that shows the game idea.

Once you generates the idea, it temporarily saves it in history. You can use this mechanic so that you generate multiple ideas and choose which are the game idea and use it to make the game. (If you close the generator, the history won't save.)

It can generate over 15 billion unique idea! (ye, did the mathz)

You can still have fun using it without knowing how to program a game, you invite a friend and read through some of the weird game ideas and laugh at it, like it's garbage! ;)

You can post your first generated game idea in the comments section! :)
